trends.topic: China unveils domestically designed 14nm AI accelerator claiming parity with Nvidia 4nm GPUs via 3D hybrid bonding
trends.reason: China’s claim that a homegrown 14nm AI chip can rival Nvidia’s cutting-edge 4nm GPUs using advanced 3D hybrid bonding and delivering a stated 120 TFLOPS signals a potentially major shift in AI hardware competitiveness under export controls, with implications for global supply chains and geopolitical tech rivalry.
trends.search_keywords: China AI chip, 14nm, Nvidia, 3D hybrid bonding, 120 TFLOPS, accelerator
